title: Before you start an algo stable coin, listen to this | DeFi Markets
description:
We have several recommendations to make, after all the research we have done recently on algo stable coins. To be specific, we have 3 recommendations regarding the secondary token, how to avoid economic exploitation, and the responsiveness to price action of the tokens.

-

Want more in-depth content?

1) Support us on our Patreon: www.patreon.com/economicsdesign

2) [Textbook] The Economics and Math of Token Engineering and DeFi https://book.economicsdesign.com/

3) Academy: https://academy.economicsdesign.com/

4) Check out our new research site & dashboard: https://econteric.com/

5) Newsletter: https://economicsdesign.substack.com/
